price: 37. And a sign for them is the night. We withdraw therefrom the day, and behold, they are in darkness.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓ'limūna
